医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
新工具 ehrapy 彻底改变了健康数据分析在亥姆霍兹慕尼黑的领导下，科学家们开发了一种易于使用的软件解决方案，专门用于分析复杂的医疗健康数据。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240912/New-tool-ehrapy-revolutionizes-health-data-analysis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240912/New-tool-ehrapy-revolutionizes-health-data-analysis.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1a2b3914-06c9-4793-bb54-6e545a96dcf1 Thu, 12 Sep 2024 15:34:26 -0400 New tool ehrapy revolutionizes health data analysis
新的人工智能成像技术增强了视网膜疾病的诊断基于人群的研究表明，视网膜疾病是发达国家不可逆性失明的最常见原因，也是发展中国家继白内障之后的第二大常见失明原因。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240912/New-AI-imaging-technique-enhances-retinal-disorder-diagnosis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240912/New-AI-imaging-technique-enhances-retinal-disorder-diagnosis.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=386ca7c6-23f7-47db-8e82-54f9a66eab7d Thu, 12 Sep 2024 15:27:44 -0400 New AI imaging technique enhances retinal disorder diagnosis
研究表明，幼儿在屏幕上停留的时间越长，语言能力越差屏幕在我们的日常生活中已经无处不在——；这意味着它们也已成为孩子们生活的一部分。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240912/Study-links-higher-screen-time-with-poorer-language-skills-in-young-children.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240912/Study-links-higher-screen-time-with-poorer-language-skills-in-young-children.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1bc12fd4-5a95-48db-bf67-3a10dceea712 Thu, 12 Sep 2024 15:23:16 -0400 Study links higher screen time with poorer language skills in young children
新发现为克服 CAR-T 细胞治疗耐药性带来了希望梅奥诊所的研究人员挖掘了癌症的分子基础，并发现了嵌合抗原受体（CAR-T 细胞疗法）在某些患者中失败的新原因。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240912/New-discovery-offers-hope-for-overcoming-CAR-T-cell-therapy-resistance.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240912/New-discovery-offers-hope-for-overcoming-CAR-T-cell-therapy-resistance.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=87b02828-08dd-4185-b590-cf2b84ae1f03 Thu, 12 Sep 2024 15:17:45 -0400 New discovery offers hope for overcoming CAR-T cell therapy resistance
世卫组织对加沙伤害的分析强调了康复服务的迫切需要根据世界卫生组织 (WHO) 对造成的伤害类型的分析，截至 7 月 23 日，加沙至少有四分之一（即 22 500 人）的伤势可能会改变他们的生活，需要现在和未来几年的康复服务加沙持续冲突：利用紧急医疗队的伤害数据估计加沙的创伤康复需求。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240912/Urgent-need-for-rehabilitation-services-highlighted-in-WHO-analysis-of-Gaza-injuries.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240912/Urgent-need-for-rehabilitation-services-highlighted-in-WHO-analysis-of-Gaza-injuries.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b32a7922-4fce-4296-97c8-cdf17c00d4d6 Thu, 12 Sep 2024 15:12:14 -0400 Urgent need for rehabilitation services highlighted in WHO analysis of Gaza injuries
新候选疫苗有望预防拉沙热托马斯·杰斐逊大学和马里兰大学巴尔的摩分校的研究人员与美国陆军传染病医学研究所 (USAMRIID) 和日内瓦基金会合作，开发了一种有前景的新型候选疫苗，可预防拉沙热。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240912/New-vaccine-candidate-shows-promise-for-protecting-against-Lassa-fever.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240912/New-vaccine-candidate-shows-promise-for-protecting-against-Lassa-fever.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=dda939fc-2da4-4b24-9901-6e908cef0387 Thu, 12 Sep 2024 15:08:39 -0400 New vaccine candidate shows promise for protecting against Lassa fever
长期接触野火烟雾会增加青少年患精神疾病的风险科罗拉多大学博尔德分校对 10,000 名 9 至 11 岁儿童进行的一项新研究显示，接触野火烟雾和其他极端形式的肮脏空气的时间每增加一天，青少年患精神疾病的风险就会增加一点。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240912/Prolonged-exposure-to-wildfire-smoke-increases-mental-illness-risk-in-youth.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240912/Prolonged-exposure-to-wildfire-smoke-increases-mental-illness-risk-in-youth.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=28c77b1c-dcd5-4f1b-be2b-325bdc419a7e Thu, 12 Sep 2024 14:54:09 -0400 Prolonged exposure to wildfire smoke increases mental illness risk in youth
制药公司进入较贫穷国家的战略仍不清楚药品获取基金会首席执行官贾亚斯里·艾耶 (Jayasree Iyer) 表示，制药公司必须优先努力为世界上服务欠缺地区的患者提供糖尿病胰岛素等药物，最重要的是衡量这些努力的有效性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240912/Pharma-companies-strategies-for-reaching-poorer-countries-remain-unclear.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240912/Pharma-companies-strategies-for-reaching-poorer-countries-remain-unclear.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0704d04e-601e-461f-9ae8-91747b7f947d Thu, 12 Sep 2024 14:33:17 -0400 Pharma companies' strategies for reaching poorer countries remain unclear
B 细胞异常被确定为三阴性乳腺癌治疗反应的潜在生物标志物贝勒医学院及合作机构的研究人员对三阴性乳腺癌患者血液和骨髓中肿瘤诱导的 B 细胞变化有了新的认识。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240912/B-cell-abnormalities-identified-as-potential-biomarkers-for-triple-阴性-breast-cancer-treatment-response.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240912/B-cell-abnormalities-identified-as-potential-biomarkers-for-triple-阴性-breast-cancer-treatment-response.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=29e22113-4b85-4e79-9738-ae635b3fabdc Thu, 12 Sep 2024 14:21:40 -0400 B cell abnormalities identified as potential biomarkers for triple negative breast cancer treatment response
早期生活方式的改变会对新陈代谢产生持久影响东芬兰大学 (UEF) 的一项新研究揭示了早期生活方式的改变如何产生长期影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240912/Early-lifestyle-changes-lead-to- permanent-impacts-on-metabolism.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240912/Early-lifestyle-changes-lead-to- permanent-impacts-on-metabolism.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b8642a09-674b-4000-a198-1dd86763d15b Thu, 12 Sep 2024 14:15:24 -0400 Early lifestyle changes lead to lasting impacts on metabolism
